programme.desc: One of Ian’s most infamous show cars, Space Junkie, comes back to into the shop in a bizarre turn of events. The gem is in desperate need of rehab and Ian brings it back to life, better than ever, with some major reworking!

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel delivers the fabrication goods as he transplants an old 1948' cab onto a modern roll-off truck and creates one bad-ass trash truck.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and Rommie must rescue Tyr, Harper and Rev from a Magog Worldship.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka, Rev and Tyr crash land after escaping a gang of Nietzscheans, but soon face a new threat: Rev's need to feed.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew must steal a jewel that is at the center of a feud between a Drift owner and the Than. Beka falls for a security chief who was formerly a thief.

programme.title: Andromeda: Pitiless As the Sun
programme.desc: Andromeda answers a distress call when a cargo ship is attacked.

programme.title: Andromeda: Last Call at the Broken Hammer
programme.desc: The crew looks for a long-lost Commonwealth leader who has gone into hiding.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost Soul
programme.desc: In 1985, 25-year-old Luana 'La Verne' Williams disappeared from her Tauranga home. Eight years later her disappearance was upgraged to a murder enquiry. Her body has never been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Looking for Justice
programme.desc: This week, for the first time ever, the prime suspect in a murder enquiry has turned to Sensing Murder for help.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where There's Smoke
programme.desc: In 2006, 19-year-old Blake Stott died in a mysterious car fire. Blake had seemingly pulled into a South Otago lay-by to have a sleep, when his late-model, un-modified car burst into flames.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Bump in the Night
programme.desc: In 1980, six-year-old Alicia O'Reilly was raped and murdered in her bed, while her sister slept less than a metre away, and her mother sleeping across the hallway.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.desc: In 1981, the headless and fingerless body of 19-year-old Kim Narelle Barry was found dumped in the bush at a mountain lookout near Wollongong, south of Sydney.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Buried Alive: Luckman and Reid
programme.desc: On the night of 4 May 1982, 13-year-old Terry Ryan rushed into his family home in Marsden, a suburb of Brisbane, and told his mother an astonishing story.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Body in the Sports Bag
programme.desc: A young Sydney man was found guilty of strangling his ex-girlfriend and stuffing the teenager's body in a cricket bag.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Theft is on everyone’s mind and the women on Drover’s Run have their own style of justice.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: When CLAIRE attends a seminar she leaves TESS in charge of Drovers Run and on her return she discovers a lot more can happen in twenty four hours than she would ever have imagined or, at least, would have led TESS to believe.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Pushed by a neighbour’s untimely death Harry works too hard and is found trapped under a tractor. Fearing the end Harry continues to play one son off against the other and Tess learns a shocking secret from Liz.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: A celebratory night out almost ends in disaster when a plan to stop Brian’s misdeeds backfires.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: More Than One Way …
programme.desc: Claire is about to achieve her dream, and wants Tess to have hers - that little cafe in Brunswick she used to talk about.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Italian Stallion
programme.desc: When Alberto, a good looking itinerant Italian, rescues Jodi from a rampant steer she falls hopelessly in love with him.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Angel of Death
programme.desc: Behind the facade of a beautiful old Inn, lies the haunting memories of a home that was once part of the Underground Railroad, and the family that helped slaves to freedom.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Overdue For Death
programme.desc: Newly designated as a \\"Literary Landmark,\\" this library is consumed with ghostly visitors with a thirst for knowledge.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Give Me Liberty or Give Me Corpses
programme.desc: The house, formerly owned by the \\"Father of American Surgery,\\" harbors a dark secret deep beneath its floors. Now restless spirits inhabit the home in which they were once the subjects of experiments and research.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunting of the Garde
programme.desc: A 1920's historic theater is rumored to be haunted by one of New London's most prominent whaling families.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dudley Dead Wright
programme.desc: A homeowner's property backs up to land where a cursed 1740's village once stood.Could evil entities have traveled from that property tothis terrified mother's homeputting her family at risk?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Manor of Mystery
programme.desc: A Museum Director and a volunteer are fearful that an upcoming Victorian exhibit about the Victorian Era and Spiritualism will uncover and agitate entities from that time period.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Felons Interrupted
programme.desc: Dog is confronted with two alleged felons in crisis. Family and friends of these bondees are convinced that they are getting into further trouble while awaiting trial, so Dog and the posse have to bring these men back to jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Let It Snow
programme.desc: Christopher is barely 21, already has a history of domestic abuse and assault, and is facing major time in a room without a view. This hunt won't be easy for Dog - the leads are few, informers and family are not forthcoming.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rush from Judgment
programme.desc: Facing hard time for forging checks, Melissa pulled a vanishing act at her sentencing hearing, bolting from the courthouse in broad daylight. Lucky for her bondsman, Dog and his posse are in Colorado and ready to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Burn & Return
programme.desc: Dog is busy. First, he's after a fugitive who is allegedly an expert in the game of "burn and return"- shoplifting goods to return them for cash refunds. But he's not easy to track.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Being hunted by the Dog is a lousy way to celebrate your birthday but that's exactly the spot that Robert finds himself in today. He's missed his court date, quit his job, and vacated his last known address.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: New Dog in Town
programme.desc: It's Beth's birthday and Dog knows just what she needs. He surprises Beth with Delilah, a puppy small enough to sit in the palm of her hand. Beth is so happy that she insists on taking the puppy with her on today's bounty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Uneasy Rider
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires when Will decides to get a motorcycle instead. Jase and the guys are inspired to design a product using zip lines that will revolutionize duck hunting.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Willie Hunting
programme.desc: While many of the guys' wives and children are in Africa doing charity work, Willie and Jase get into a debate over tracking ability which leads to a challenge--can Jase and Si track and capture Willie and Jep?

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sleep Cover
programme.desc: With Korie still in Africa, Willie and Jep must step in and supervise Bella's sleepover. When a couple boys play a prank on the girls, Willie and Jep prove to be the perfect chaperones for the task.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drive-In Revivin'
programme.desc: Korie challenges Willie to come up with a romantic gesture without spending any money. Missy and Jase compete to see who can find a girlfriend for Mountain Man.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fishful Thinking
programme.desc: Jase's hopes to win the inaugural Duck Commander Fishing Tournament is buoyed when he is able to enlist the help of legendary angler Bill Dance. Meanwhile, Willie's vanity over his greying beard leads him to make a questionable decision.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Rowdy's Big Day
programme.desc: Rowdy's adoption is finalized and he officially becomes a Robertson. Jase gets his first massage and enjoys it more than he expected.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Disappearing Acts
programme.desc: After Willie and Jase lose Si's tea cup, Si makes them go to great lengths to find it. When the entertainment for Gus's 1st birthday party falls through, Jep fills in as a magician.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Country Dream Home
programme.desc: Keith Chitwood is 27 and just graduated with an Agricultural Degree! Next up? Getting a home on a dream piece of land, with that, he’s heading back to the country and wants a house he can eventually start a family in.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: 1906 Bank On The Move
programme.desc: Wade was offered a job that he could not turn down. 25 years ago his father successfully moved a historical bank in Pincher Creek.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: 4 Ton Fireplace In Tow!
programme.desc: Alton and Jessica Puddicombe received a call of a lifetime when his neighbor reached out the day of their wedding and offered them his 1932 farmhouse.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Oversized Garage Coming!
programme.desc: Peter and Sheena Rector have seven children with three kids sharing a bedroom, it’s simply not enough space.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Midnight Mud Race
programme.desc: Ian and Cindy have finally found their dream location but moving their stunning new property proves messier than expected.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Rocky Mountain Trek
programme.desc: Wade and his crew transport a 60-tonne cabin across some of the trickiest terrain yet.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Race Against Time
programme.desc: Wade’s team haul a 70-tonne, 100ft home through crowded suburban streets - but not before they attempt to cut the home down to size. This could be an engineering nightmare!

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Mountain Hell
programme.desc: Wade fears he’s met his match with this next transport – moving a tricky cabin the most treacherous of conditions.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Hell On The Highway
programme.desc: First time buyer Doug is taking the plunge and putting his trust in Wade’s to protect his investment – a 50 tonne newly built house with all mod cons. As Doug and Wade’s crew will find out though, battling tight bridges, power lines and mechanical fa …

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Killer Storm
programme.desc: Wade, Kelly and the crew, battle forces of nature to get a bulky home to its new owners. With torrential weather threatening to derail the move, Wade and team struggle to get through the storm.

programme.title: Cabin Truckers: Danger In The Dark
programme.desc: Jaylene has successfully found Matt and Melanie the perfect two storey, 3600 feet, 50 tonne “second hand home” but it’s is one of the tallest houses Wade’s has ever moved and with only a tight five hour window to make it out of the city, Wade may hav …

programme.title: Divorce Court: Coming to America
programme.desc: Keith claims he is married to two other women overseas and plans to bring them over! Paw'lla says Keith is a fake pastor who doesn't know what he's talking about! Keith says he has a master plan for all of these wives!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Studs Need Love Too
programme.desc: Tahani said Cymbre's jealous fits of rage has caused her to lose a job and suspects him of cheating after finding a hotel receipt! He doesn't trust her either after she cheated before. Will this couple be able to trust again or are they too far gone?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Fantasy Fail
programme.desc: Victoria is sick of Casey neglecting his responsibilities. Casey feels like a slave for taking care of the kids while she flies around the world for modeling gigs. Can Casey break out of the Mr. Mom role and start helping with the bills?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Heart Break Hotel
programme.desc: Brianna says Steven constantly looks at other women behind her back which has taken a toll on her confidence. He says her overprotectiveness leads to arguments that end up with her accusing him of cheating.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Dead Weight
programme.desc: They say opposites attract, but Betty is starting to feel weighed down by David. David is lazy and disrespectful for how broke he is all the time. Betty no longer wants to be tied down by being with someone who is always unemployed and lies about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun
programme.desc: When Milton came into Sona’s life, all the stars were aligned but now their relationship has been out of orbit. Sona is a firm believer in astrology and zodiac signs, but this Leo can no longer tolerate the cheating ways of Milton who is an Aries.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy About You
programme.desc: Mali is five years younger than his girlfriend Zay and they are total opposites. He still wants to party, and she is ready to settle down.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Vegas or Bust
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket - Heidi and Stephanie.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Playing Possum
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rainy Day Woman
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ticket to Ride
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Irons in the Fire
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rocky Mountain Roundup
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Inside Out
programme.desc: Dog kickstarts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Run's House: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: Believing Diggy's fly wardrobe may have something to do with girls being interested in him, Russy raids Diggy's closet. Hearing the boys argue over clothes, Justine decides to get Russy some clothes of his own.

programme.title: Run's House: Run's Manner House
programme.desc: Rev and Justine are both fed up with the boys' rude behavior. Justine decides to bring in a supernanny type person to teach the family the basics in social etiquette.

programme.title: Run's House: When Diggy Met Brittney
programme.desc: When Rev learns that Diggy's play date is actually with two girls he believes that Diggy must have a crush on one of them. He's hoping it's Ja Rule's daughter because they must be rich.

programme.title: Run's House: Rapper's Retreat
programme.desc: Rev receives guest passes to the Mohegan Sun in Connecticut. Justine doesn't want to go. Rev is proud of Jojo's recent recordings with Blackout and wants to reward him as a fellow rapper.

programme.title: Run's House: Camp Rev
programme.desc: Since Rev can't remember the last time Diggy and Russy had a sleepover, he requests that they invite their friends over for an unforgettable sleepover that Rev dubs "Camp Rev."

programme.title: Run's House: Who's Your Daddy?
programme.desc: While putting together her latest insert of Angela's Rundown, Angela discovers she has way too much content to fit into one sixteen-page insert. She and her crew at work discuss a full magazine.

programme.title: Run's House: Rock in Run's House
programme.desc: When Rev hears that his good friend Kid Rock is coming into town he invites him to stay at the house. Russy hopes that Kid will teach him how to play his guitar.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Steps
programme.desc: Justine is babysitting her sister Michelle's eleven month old baby, Ameera, for two nights. The boys look forward to helping their mom baby-sit as long as they don't have to change diapers.

programme.title: Run's House: Mixed and Mastered
programme.desc: With their tracks finally mixed and mastered JoJo, Zach and Reggie, aka "Blackout," are ready to hit the streets and find a record deal.

programme.title: Run's House: Too Cool for Old School
programme.desc: To keep occupied while going to an engineer tech school in the city, JoJo begins an internship at Phat Farm to learn the family business.

programme.title: Run's House: When the Cat's Away...
programme.desc: Justine's Brown Sugar jewelry line is up and running. And better yet, the Home Shopping Network is interested in working with her. So it's off to sunny Tampa to put Justine's jewelry on air.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Suicide Possession
programme.desc: Joan and her boyfriend Tony are seeing apparitions in their New Jersey home. Both are concerned that the spirits are influencing their behavior: a non-drinker, Tony has turned to the bottle while Joan has thoughts of harming herself.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger

programme.title: Arthur: Carl's Concerto/Too Much of a Good Thing
programme.desc: Carl has agreed to play the accordion for George's puppet show. But his routines are getting in the way of rehearsals. Buster enlists Binky's help to keep him from gorging on delicious Tuvaluna cookies. Will Buster's self-control crumble?

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Second Chance/Arthur and the Whole Truth
programme.desc: With the help of a little time travel, Buster turns back the clock to see what his life would be like if he were a genius. Arthur isn't happy when he discovers that Buster has been telling him some white lies, just to spare his feelings.

programme.title: Arthur: Fernkenstein's Monster/D.W., Dancing Queen
programme.desc: Inspired by Mary Shelley's "Frankenstein," Fern tells a tale so scary that Arthur and the gang become afraid of her! Then, Binky decides to teach D.W. to dance, but she just doesn't seem to get the moves. Is D.W. a no-talent klutz?

programme.title: Arthur: Brain's Brain/Brain Sees Stars
programme.desc: Brain's Easter egg hunts are notoriously hard. But this year's might prove impossible if Brain can't remember where he hid the final egg. Then, crazy coincidences have prevented Brain from seeing a meteor shower in person.

programme.title: Arthur: Baseball Blues/Brain's Biggest Blunder
programme.desc: It's Grebelings season and George can't wait to play! After all, no one knows more about baseball than George. Then, wBrain gets teamed with Buster and Binky in the annual Arithmattack competition.

programme.title: Arthur: Happy Anniversary
programme.desc: Arthur's parents have been married for 10 years and it's time to celebrate! But the festivities are cut short when the van breaks down, stranding the whole family. Will the Reads miss their fancy dinner reservation?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Almost Boring Day/The Half-Baked Sale
programme.desc: It's raining and boy is it BORING! But then, in Grandma Thora's attic, Arthur and D.W. discover some really FASCINATING stuff about their parents. Next, Grandma Thora is helping to organize a bake sale, but her goodies aren’t very good.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Writes A Story/Arthur's Lost Dog
programme.desc: Struggling with a school assignment, Arthur decides that his regular life is just too boring to write about. And, Arthur is the only one who believes in the superior intelligence of his dog. But even Arthur gets confused when Pal runs away.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: There is a virus spreading through Lakewood Elementary--it’s new nicknames and it’s changing how everyone treats each other! The playground has been quiet lately--too quiet--and the Tough Customers don't like it one bit.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: North Africa (November 1942)
programme.desc: In the North African desert in 1942, American fighting forces encounter the dreaded Rommel for the first time to stop the German war machine.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Burma: The Forgotten Front (Spring 1943)
programme.desc: The Japanese meet resistance from British forces as they advance through Burma to take India in 1944.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Sicily
programme.desc: Fresh from victory in North Africa, the Allies successfully invade the island of Sicily, staging an eventual Italian withdrawal from the war.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Bombing of Ploesti
programme.desc: American bombers target a Romanian oil refinery in a daring 1943 mission.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Monte Cassino (September 3, 1943)
programme.desc: As the allies make their way into Italy, they encounter tremendous resistance at German defensive positions along the Gustav line. One of these locations is an ancient monastery called Monte Cassino.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Hitting Back
programme.desc: After surviving the German bombing campaign of British cities, RAF Bomber Command struck back against Germany. The devastating consequences of raids, for both for the young men in the skies and the people on the ground, are portrayed in this film.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Getting Home
programme.desc: In this film, Bomber Command personnel and a Luftwaffe pilot take the viewer through the frightening reality of fighting in the skies as they try to get a damaged bomber home.

programme.title: War Story: Bomb Girls Remember
programme.desc: During the Second World War, 250,000 Canadian women helped to build the arsenal of democracy. These young women met the challenges of factory work and helped to win the Second World War, and by doing so, paved the way for future generations.

programme.title: War Story: Sicily: The First Campaign
programme.desc: The Sicily Campaign began with the largest seaborne invasion in history on 9-10 July 1943. The Allied forces of Britain, Canada, and the United States sought to knock Italy out of the war and attack Germany from the south.

programme.title: War Story: Ortona: The War Inside
programme.desc: The War Inside is a personal retelling of one of the fiercest battles of the Italian Campaign from the searing points of view of Canadian infantrymen, a tanker, a stretcher bearer, and a German paratrooper.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alex & Matt
programme.desc: Alex has been chatting to Matt for a year and thinks he could be the one. But after several failed attempts to meet, Alex wants Julie and Oobah to track him down. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Fans of popular YouTube star Andrea Russett call on Nev and Max to help catch a potential stalker who is impersonating Andrea's family online. What the guys uncover will shock even them. (S5, ep17)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Andria & David
programme.desc: David is the only love Andria has ever known. Love letters and voice messages make Andria stay. But having never met after 10 years, she needs to know what he is hiding that keeps him away. (S4, ep15)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Angelica & Jeroen
programme.desc: Angelica's been speaking to Jeroen online for three and a half years. After several failed attempts to meet, she's now desperate to find out if Jeroen is real? (S2, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Anthony & Marq
programme.desc: Anthony is a war veteran who wears his heart on his sleeve. Over a year ago, he bonded online with a caring man named Marq. Today, they're head over heels in love - but what is Marq hiding?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Antoinette & Albert
programme.desc: A year after meeting 'T-lights' on Instagram, 'instaceleb' Antoinette is ready to meet him, but he always brushes off the idea. Is he really the online celebrity he claims to be?

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 211
programme.desc: Hairdresser Luna must hell his best friend Lola how much he likes her. Carleen is readu to let Jessica know her true feelings.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 212
programme.desc: Biana needs to tell her best friend of 10 years that she's in love with him. Tanner will come clean with his true feelings for his best friend.

programme.title: The Hills: Big Girls Don't Cry
programme.desc: Lauren heads to Laguna Beach to get advice from her mother over her recent situation. Audrina meets up with her former fling, Justin. Spencer proposes to Heidi. (S3, ep2)

programme.title: The Hills: Truth And Time Tells All / Meet The Parents
programme.desc: Now she's decided to give Justin a second chance, Audrina wants Lauren to get to know her boy better. She invites Lauren to drinks, and Lauren agrees, despite being apprehensive. (S3, ep3)

programme.title: The Hills: Rolling With The Enemy / Second Chances
programme.desc: After Justin's disappearing act at Brody's barbeque on the last episode, Lauren thought Audrina's days with the bad boy were over. (S3, ep5)

programme.title: The Hills: They Meet Again / For Better Or Worse
programme.desc: Lauren and Jason have been spending a lot of time together lately, but while at lunch, Jason lets it slip that not only does he have a girlfriend, but they're moving in together! (S3, ep8)

programme.title: The City: If She Can Make It Here...
programme.desc: Whitney arrives in New York City during fashion week just in time to start her new career with iconic designer, Diane Von Furstenberg. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Will Reveal Itself
programme.desc: Whitney's world is turned upside-down when a boy from her past shows up to warn her that Jay has been fooling around. Olivia decides that befriending Whitney is her new project. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Last Chance for Justice
programme.desc: A report on the 1980 murder of Marilyn McIntyre, who was found dead in her home. Her husband, Lane, had returned home from work that morning and found her body. As police checked into his alibi, he named his friend Curt Forbes as a potential suspect.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Secrets of the Well
programme.desc: Reports on two separate unsolved murders with strange similarities, both solved by Georgia criminal investigator Clay Bryant. 1) a report on the murder case of Gwendolyn Moore 2) The disappearance of fire chief Fred Wilkerson.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Bitter Pill
programme.desc: Stella Nickell of Auburn, Washington, was sentenced to 90 year in federal prison for poisoning her husband Bruce and Sue Snow, a Seattle bank manager with cyanide-laced Excedrin.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Eleven Hundred Miles to Murder
programme.desc: Authorities first suspect the husband in the savage murder of a Florida doctor, but when he has an alibi, they follow a tip on a 1,100 mile trip that takes the case in an unexpected direction.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: The 2010 murder investigation of 23-year-old dancer Julie Kibuishi in Southern California, and how her friend Sam Herr, became the prime suspect in the case until investigators encountered an aspiring actor with a horrific tale to tell.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Family Accused
programme.desc: A report that focuses on cases where people accused of sexually abusing children were tried and imprisoned based on little real evidence other than the testimony of young children.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Doomsday
programme.desc: When an unscrupulous manufacturer risks World War III by offering a hydrogen bomb for sale, the Impossible Missions Force enters the bidding with a dangerous plan to keep the weapon out of enemy hands.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Bunker, Pt. 1
programme.desc: The IMF races a paid killer who is stalking a nuclear scientist forced by the enemy to work on a device that could upset the world power balance in the first of a two-part episode.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Bunker, Pt. 2
programme.desc: While trying to free a nuclear scientist and his wife from enemy hands, the IMF is trapped when a would-be assassin takes over one of Rollin's disguises in Part 2.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Nitro
programme.desc: The IMF finds itself only a second away from eternity when they intercept a nitroglycerine expert who plans to blow up the government house of a small country, thus provoking war with its neighbor nation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Vault
programme.desc: Guest star Nehemiah Persoff as a corrupt Latin American official plots to loot his own country of $40,000,000 with the connivance of the IMF.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop can't find anybody to play with her. When the others see her feeling sad, they decide to play whatever she wants to play. The dinos and kids are planning a camp-out at the park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop is disappointed when their trip to the zoo is postponed. Barney tells Baby Bop a tale about keeping your promise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Riff has many special qualities, but sometimes, his shyness makes it hard for him to meet new friends. It’s a special day in the park as Barney and the little dinosaurs enjoy an Art Festival.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Parade of Bikes
programme.desc: It's the day of the bike parade. But Nick has had a bike accident that leaves his bike in need of repair by Mr. Boyd. Barney helps Baby Bop and the children learn all about bicycles—and that they are a wonderful way to exercise and have fun.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ is pretending to be a great detective, and needs a mystery to solve! Barney sees Riff protecting a nest full of duck eggs.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Mother Goose - Fun With Reading
programme.desc: While playing in the caboose, BJ is surprised to learn that "The Land of Mother Goose" truly exists. Several Mother Goose characters have come to ask for help! Parts of their rhymes are missing! When Mother Goose arrives, she fixes the problem.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Let's Go For A Ride!
programme.desc: Barney and the children have fun playing with and learning about busses and cars.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Numbers! Numbers!
programme.desc: Tony shares a box full of numbers that he made with his dad. He is showing them off when a gust of wind blows them all away. Barney and the kids decide to go on a number hunt. They soon find Baby Bop and their hunt takes the group all over the park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney and his friends are excited about a fishing contest. Barney tells Riff about a famous musician named Beethoven who wrote beautiful music even when he couldn't hear.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Betsy's Last Stand
programme.desc: With their beloved bread truck on life support, Ton and Allen head to an auction to help save her. Will an industrial grinder and a classic Chevy be enough to mend Betsy, or will the guys be forced to say goodbye for good?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Win Lose or Joust
programme.desc: Ton and Allen race back from an auction to purchase a rare comic valued at over $100,000. The guys uncover a Samurai sword used for ritual suicide and Allen lives out his childhood fantasy of becoming knight.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Ruff Day
programme.desc: Ton and Allen head to an auction in Ton's hometown and end up battling with a big-mouthed buyer. They discover a pair of tranquilizer dart guns and also end up fighting with a K9!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Money Makin' Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes on the attack & ends up on a collision course with a hardened veteran auction buyer. They uncover a collection of speedy off-road vehicles and some hardcore heavy metal from the turn-of the-century!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Whiskey Business
programme.desc: An auction in Allen's old stomping grounds triggers memories of being a "lone wolf." The guys find a set of RC race boats and when they buy a man-cave unit full of old whiskey, a night of partying leads to some tough sales.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Separation Anxiety
programme.desc: With Ton missing, Allen struggles to keep the pawn shop afloat while training Elle to work an auction. After a fierce bidding war with Caroline, pieces from a century old motorcycle may not be enough to save the day. ed.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: You Foos You Lose
programme.desc: When their truck breaks down, Ton and Allen lay it all on the line to raise money to fix her. They score a Foosball table, Tommy Gun drums and to Ton's delight, a treasure trove of Twinkies, but will it be enough?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust

programme.desc: Fourth of July in Montana – Flathead Lake is where the party is at. But with the heat tempers flare and the free flowing alcohol combines to make a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Wardens: Behind The Shed
programme.desc: When the game ranges are opened up for Antler Shed Hunting its all hands on deck for the Montana Game Wardens. Reports of Bears, Mountain Lions and lost hunters keep the wardens busy.

programme.title: Wardens: Fun in The Sun
programme.desc: When Jet skies get too close to boats things can turn dangerous. And Warden Bryan Golie questions an angler in search for the truth.

programme.title: Wardens: Above & Beyond
programme.desc: Wardens often go the extra mile to investigate a report of illegal activity, help a hunter or protect landowner rights. This week Wardens go that extra mile with an unexpected outcome.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fresh Paint
programme.desc: Andy McNally’s first shift on the job turns into mayhem when shots are fired in a downtown rooming house. In the midst of the chaos, Andy triumphantly makes her first big arrest

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Mercury Retrograde
programme.desc: As the other rookies hunt down a dangerous escaped convict, Swarek drags Andy through his undercover hauntson a mission he won’t explain. At first, Andy assumes Swarek is a rogue cop trying to settle scores from his undercover days.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fite Nite
programme.desc: While working on a high-stakes gun raid, Andy and Gail stumble upon a victim of domestic abuse whose brutal experience in the system has taught her not to trust the police.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Signals Crossed
programme.desc: Andy’s undercover skills are tested –and found to be lacking –during a citywidecampaign to clean up the streets, whenshe’s tapped to pose as a prostitute in order to arrest unsuspecting johns.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Broad Daylight
programme.desc: A home invasion at an upscale address leads to a massive first response call that brings out the training officers in full force. After the scene is cleared, Andy and Traci remain behind with the terrified homeowner.

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: A former thief (Nicolas Cage) has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner (Josh Lucas) kidnaps his daughter and locks her in a cab.

programme.title: Rememory
programme.desc: An amateur sleuth steals a machine that can extract, record and play the memories of another person. He uses the device to try and solve the mysterious death of the man who invented it.

programme.title: Survivor
programme.desc: Framed for a terrorist bombing, a foreign service officer (Milla Jovovich) must dodge a top assassin (Pierce Brosnan), while racing against time to thwart a deadly plot.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Hunting with the Enemy
programme.desc: An urn commissioned in a Cambodian monastery by the Chinese emperor for the remains of Confucius is about to be destroyed by systematic bombing of a whole province.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Under the Ice
programme.desc: Despite terrible weather, Sidney drags Nigel along to an Arctic base where an ancient Indian mummy has been found, who turns out to be an Anasazi.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Antianeirai
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel travel to Istanbul to investigate the death of one Sydney's friends, a professor who was trying to prove Hercules did exist by finding the Belt of Hippolyte.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Faux Fox
programme.desc: When Nigel is charmed by brilliant student Lorraine to show her their offices (and kiss), a burglar knocks out Sidney, but what was robbed?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Pandora's Box
programme.desc: Sidney inherits from the best relic hunter of the previous generation a key and rushes with Nigel on the hunt for the one treasure he never found: Pandora's box.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Warlord
programme.desc: Bekkastan, 1401 AD: warrior princess Kahina proves her right to rule. 2002: Sydney and Nigel unearth a cave painting that might lead them to Kahina's Saddle. But her descendants cause complications.

programme.title: Alien Crash Retrievals
programme.desc: Learn the shocking truth about extraterrestrial beings on planet Earth. World governments and military factions are not only aware of the Alien presence; they may be in communication with alien races.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries: Kecksburg UFO
programme.desc: This episode includes: Kecksburg UFO (Pts. 1 & 2), Update: Pizza Man & 3rd Anniversary Reunion, Unknown Arsonist & UD and Hospital Babynap.

programme.title: From the Mothman to the Reptilians: A guide to alien species
programme.desc: Witnesses from around the world have had close encounters with extraterrestrial races, shaping our imagination and becoming cultural phenomena.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens : Origin Of Humanity
programme.desc: Increasing evidence and sightings of UFOs suggest contact with extraterrestrial beings who may have influenced the origins of human life.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Redemption
programme.desc: Siobhan falls while rock climbing. As the others search for her, she dreams that she is on trial for supporting the Taelons. Zo'or questions whether Sandoval's CVI imperative to serve the Taelons has broken down as others are experiencing.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Between Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: Dr. Belman's daughter does human testing on herself with an accelerant that causes her to rapidly evolve. Joshua Doors decides somebody should run against President Thompson in the election, somebody who will stand up to the Taelons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Isabel
programme.desc: Maiya experiences dimensional phasing. Augur and Liam believe they need to bring Isabel and Maiya together to let the universe merge them. Jonathan Doors announces his presidential candidacy and meets with Zo'or.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict
programme.desc: An escaped Jiridian takes Lili hostage. Their shuttle is sucked on to a Kimera ship where they, with Liam, have to go through an obstacle course to get to the core to exit.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict
programme.desc: Using Jiridian technology, scientists create a physical bio surrogates where a human consciousness can be transferred. When a surrogate escapes, they must find it before it uses its fighting and weapons knowledge.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Second Chances
programme.desc: A Taelon program offers a transformation into a younger, healthier version of oneself. Liam fears that something more dangerous is also happening. Lili is worried that Doors' run for the presidency is negatively affecting the resistance.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Payback
programme.desc: A mysterious death by poisoning creates questions about the safety of portal technology. When a Taelon is killed in the same manner, the investigation leads to a very smart scientist that even the Resistance was scared to work with.

programme.title: The Lost World: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: Challenger comes face to face with an old friend from England, Dr. William Hargrove. Summerlee, Malone, and Marguerite agree to help the Queen of the nymphs and fairies break a curse.

programme.title: The Lost World: Time After Time
programme.desc: While hunting, Roxton and Veronica come across two individuals from the future. One becomes keen on using Marguerite to lead him to riches, and the other is set on stopping that from happening.

programme.title: The Lost World: Prodigal Father
programme.desc: The explorers find trouble when they help save and aid a man they believe is Veronica's long lost father on the run from Kartas, a bounty hunter.

programme.title: The Lost World: Birthright
programme.desc: Summerlee, Roxton, and Veronica must outrun a T-rex that's tracking them for dinner. Meanwhile Marguerite, Malone, and Challenger are manipulated by Ramses to help him take his place as pharaoh.

programme.title: The Lost World: Resurrection
programme.desc: Malone and Veronica must defend the treehouse from mercenaries. After being ambushed by Norse warriors, Roxton must take the life of another in order to rise from the dead and save Marguerite.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Anita Manning and James Lewis continue to battle it out, starting in Horncastle, Lincolnshire, and ending up at an auction showdown in Diss, Norfolk.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Anita Manning is close on the heels of James Lewis as they battle it out to become king or queen of antiques profits. Winding through the English countryside, they start in Fakenham ending up with an auction in Aylsham.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: James Lewis has nudged ahead in the antique profit stakes but Anita Manning is fighting back hard. It's still all to play for as they start the day's journey in Needham Market, Suffolk, and end with an exciting auction in Bedford.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's the last day for Anita Manning to snatch the lead from James Lewis as they start in Woburn in Bedfordshire and end up at a gripping auction in Cirencester, Gloucestershire.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's the first day for Charlie Ross and James Braxton to take to the road, and what a day it is! Their adventures start in the Highlands of Scotland in a small town called Cromarty and end in Buckie at a record-breaking auction showdown.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: After the excitement of yesterday's auction James Braxton has a long way to go to catch Charlie Ross. Beginning in the fishing village of Cullen in the Highlands of Scotland, they end up in Aberdeen for the auction showdown.

programme.title: Cricket
programme.desc: Follow some of the greatest cricket action featuring coverage of Twenty20, Test and ODI events.

programme.title: Darts
programme.desc: Action from the world of darts.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alex & Matt
programme.desc: Alex has been chatting to Matt for a year and thinks he could be the one. But after several failed attempts to meet, Alex wants Julie and Oobah to track him down. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Tasheeka & Aaron
programme.desc: After avoiding video calls for 2 years, Tasheeka is desperate to find out if Aaron is her Prince Charming. It's up to Julie and Oobah to see if this online romance has a fairy tale ending. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alayah & Tommy
programme.desc: Alayah and Tommy started messaging on a live streaming platform. Alayah thinks he could be the one, but when they try and meet, he keeps cancelling. Nella and Oobah help to track him down. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Taylor & Brad
programme.desc: Taylor is falling in love with Brad despite never having seen his face. Can Oobah and Nella find the man of her dreams, and will Taylor get her happy ever after? (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Hayley & Alex
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Catfish US royalty Kamie to help Hayley finally meet Alex. But after five months of avoiding phone calls and cancelling on her, will she get her a fairy tale ending? (S2, ep4)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Pain and Gain
programme.desc: A report about the crimes of the Sun Gym gang, a group of Miami, Florida drifters, petty thieves, and bodybuilders who kidnapped and killed wealthy people to fuel their lifestyle.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Death Wish
programme.desc: A report surrounding the July 2009 death of Jeffrey Locker, whose body was found slumped over the steering wheel of his car in Harlem, New York. When authorities tracked Locker’s ATM card to Kenneth Minor, Minor said Locker had begged Minor to kill him.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Who Killed the Prosecutor?
programme.desc: Steve Tauzer, a prominent assistant district attorney in Kern County, CA, was found murdered in his garage. Chris Hillis, a former police officer, a colleague and friend of Tauzer, was arrested for the murder. Chris’ son Lance was key to the case.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Stranger You Know
programme.desc: A report about Marti Hill, who was savagely beaten in her Prairie Village, Kansas home. She was found by police barely breathing and covered in blood.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Father and Son
programme.desc: A teenager makes a discovery that could prove his mother's death was not suicide.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Strange Truth
programme.desc: In March 2003, Ramona Krotine left an office party and was never seen alive again. 24 hours later, she was found in the trunk of her car, beaten and shot to death. At first, police suspected a botched robbery but later believed her husband was to blame.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: Grandpa's in the Doghouse
programme.desc: Pam's sheepdog, Daisy, gets loose and chases Ballard the cat. When Mr. Conroy is called to catch Daisy, he bumps into Grandpa, switches glasses with him, and takes him to the pound instead of Daisy.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: Wolf Pride
programme.desc: A film about a mean and violent werewolf is shot in Wolverton. Outraged by the poor misrepresentation of werewolves, Scott decides to be a stuntman in order to change the horror film into a comedy.

programme.title: Monster Squad: Queen Bee
programme.desc: Dracula infiltrates the Queen Bee's hive in an effort to thwart a worldwide bee invasion.

programme.title: Monster Squad: Mr. Mephisto
programme.desc: Confusion abounds when Mr. Mephisto replaces Mayor Goldwyn with a lookalike doll who spouts off radical opinions.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Tickler
programme.desc: The Tickler passes off counterfeit bills in an attempt to lure the Monster Squad into a trap.

programme.title: Monster Squad: The Ringmaster
programme.desc: The Ringmaster holds children hostage as part of a larger scheme to buy out and close down all of the toy stores in America.

programme.title: Monster Squad
programme.desc: Frank and Dracula sign up for music lessons in an attempt to foil the mad musicians who robbed a telethon.

programme.title: Monster Squad: No Face
programme.desc: Mayor Goldwyn gives the deed to the city to Chief Running Nose, and then he declares all crime legal. Before long, the Monster Squad discovers No Face has been masquerading as both of them.

programme.title: The Vampire Bat
programme.desc: When corpses drained of blood begin to show up in an European village, town elders suspect a vampire on the loose.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E17 - Through The Looking Glass
programme.desc: Moya tries to starburst to prove to the crew that she still can. It goes slightly wrong though and she gets stuck in starburst.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E18 - A Bug's Life
programme.desc: A peacekeeper ship is approaching Moya, so Crichton and Aeryn pose as peacekeeper officers on a secret mission.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E19 - Nerve
programme.desc: Aeryn has been critically wounded. She needs some tissue samples to heal. The only source is the Secret base the Peacekeeper mentioned.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E20 - The Hidden Memory
programme.desc: Scorpius attempts to extract the wormhole technology from Crichton's mind, while Aeryn mounts a rescue operation.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S1 E21 - Bone To Be Wild
programme.desc: The crew finds a planetoid that's a botanical paradise. Occupied by a scientist and a peaceful girl. But one is a killer.
